function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of transparency in evidence sources","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and integration of research, data, and expertise across stakeholders and sectors","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient dissemination of evidence to target audiences","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proliferation of misinformation and fake news on social media platforms during pandemics","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak collaboration among relevant stakeholders in disseminating evidence during pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scarcity of relevant research and actionable evidence during pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited utilization of evidence in decision-making in low and middle-income countries.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor communication between researchers and decision-makers.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Corruption, institutional constraints, and weak mechanisms to support evidence-informed decision-making.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extensive spread of the coronavirus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Isolation of infected patients in homes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close interaction in public places after the end of quarantine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Home quarantine creating social and psychological challenges due to long stays at home and isolation","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective treatment for newly emerging infectious diseases such as covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"History of epidemics driving housing reforms and urban regeneration","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of viral spread within homes due to prolonged periods spent indoors with family members and limited ventilation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate living space and facilities for remote work and study, leading to increased stress and reduced productivity.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate quarantine facilities within homes for infected individuals, leading to increased risk of transmission within the household.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding in public areas of multi-story apartment buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adaptation of living spaces for remote work and study","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extended periods at home during quarantine","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infection through shared surfaces and common facilities in residential complexes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological impact and discontent among residents due to lack of preparation for epidemics in residential buildings","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for additional spaces in apartments to support pandemic-resilient living","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor air quality in homes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited outdoor spaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation and indoor air quality iaq","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate space for social distancing and home quarantine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of domestic green spaces and natural views","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor ventilation and indoor air quality iaq leading to the transmission of airborne viruses like covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sound insulation in multi-story apartment buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate natural light and views leading to reduced psychological well-being and immunity","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 survival time in aerosols ranging from 90 min to 3 hours","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosols with the virus can remain suspended in the air for extended periods of time and travel over distances of more than one meter","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Small infectious droplets can travel for up to 4 meters in quiet, enclosed environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient air flow patterns in hvac systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Link between air pollution and the spread of covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases through hvac systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate natural ventilation leading to infection spread","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate building design for air flow patterns","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate hvac systems contributing to covid-19 transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Harmful effects of uv rays on humans","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air quality as a strategic concern during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of hvac systems during infectious disease outbreaks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air flow control in hvac systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential ineffective use of uv lamps for killing viruses, harmful organisms, and bacteria in homes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on houseplants as a sole solution for air purification in naturally ventilated homes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate access to sunlight or daylight in buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Developing standardized daylight levels without considering disease transmission risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglecting the impact of low relative humidity on disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
